body_html: FWIW, your Python script only times how long it takes to schedule the operations for execution. You need to synchronize on the device before the end = time.time() call, e.g., with torch.cuda.synchronize().
body_text: FWIW, your Python script only times how long it takes to schedule the operations for execution. You need to synchronize on the device before the end = time.time() call, e.g., with torch.cuda.synchronize().
body: FWIW, your Python script only times how long it takes to schedule the operations for execution. You need to synchronize on the device before the `end = time.time()` call, e.g., with `torch.cuda.synchronize()`.
